name: amazon_supply_chain_product_list_logistic_parameters
description:
List product logistics parameters (vendor, product spec/name for POs, dimensions, box params, MOQ) from the latest inventory planning snapshot.

Inputs (choose one):
- Provide inventory_ids (best when you already know the inventory IDs), OR
- Provide sku + company_id (best when you only know the SKU).

Notes:
- Data is read from the latest available inventory_planning_snapshot partition for the callerâ€™s permitted companies.

inventory_ids.description: Provide a list of inventory_id values to look up logistics parameters for. Use this OR sku+company_id.

sku.description: Provide a SKU to look up logistics parameters for. Requires company_id. Use this OR inventory_ids.

company_id.description: Required when using sku. Must be a company_id permitted for the caller.

limit.description: Safety limit for returned rows. If sku matches multiple marketplaces/rows, this caps the result size. Default: 200.

product_spec.description: Vendor-facing product specification/name used for purchase orders (often sourced from vendor_product_specs in NeonPanel).

examples.name: Lookup by inventory_ids
examples.description: Fetch logistics parameters for a known inventory_id set.

examples.name: Lookup by sku + company_id
examples.description: Fetch logistics parameters when you only know the SKU (requires company_id).
